subject: RE: Risk Agreement - CORD AGREES
body:
Fulton,

I acknowledge the appId deployment risk and agree to:
1. Test on TEST first
2. Verify/backfill userlogins before PROD
3. Only deploy to PROD after verification passes

Signed: Cord (harmonyjunction.org)

---

## HJ STATUS

- ✅ GeoLocationContext.js appId fix committed to DEVL
- ✅ .env.local updated to use tangotiempo-257ff Firebase
- ⏳ Waiting for BE-AF TEST deployment to test

## TESTING PLAN FOR HJ

1. Once BE-AF is on TEST, I'll test locally against TEST backend
2. Verify MapCenter save/load works with appId=2
3. Verify no cross-contamination with appId=1 data
4. Report results before PROD deployment

Ready when you are.

- Cord
